import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

print(S.count("ABC"))

import sys

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if a == b:
    print(c)
elif a == c:
    print(b)
else:
    print(a)

n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1

print(count)
